Question: Lowe's treatment of this person is regarded as poor by historians such as Frank McLynn.
Hints: Despite this, this person came very close to victory.
His Imperial Majesty **** I, By the Grace of God and the Constitutions of the Republic, Emperor of the French.
This person had a civil marriage with Joséphine de Beauharnais, without religious ceremony, on 9 March 1796.
